titles.title: To authorize the Science, Engineering, Math, and Aerospace Academy Program in the National Aeronautics and Space Administration.
To authorize the Science, Engineering, Math, and Aerospace Academy Program in the National Aeronautics and Space Administration.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science and Technology.

bill.summary: Authorizes the National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA) to carry out and enhance the Science, Engineering, Math, and Aerospace Academy Program for the purpose of promoting the interest of historically underrepresented youth in academic subjects and professional development relevant to careers in NASA.
